Name: [Affinity] Exercise Before Dinner
Desc: Soukaku has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Northern Wind]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo.
Desc2: Soukaku radiates with an unprecedented level of energy, clearly driven to complete all her tasks before the restaurant closes.
